topic.title: ZeroMusic
topic.body:
I want to upload some music but it keep showing Content signing failed.
How to solve this ?

1618267083_1Mx9Lz182swtKLQBaBRfvjH9kr3tm.body: For me, they are same with new name

I am a muslim, but for me they bring chaos to muslim society. They claim they follow the teach of prophet Muhammad (Peace be Upon Him) but actually they only follow their own interpretation. Their history are close with the raise of SA kingdom. When they join with british to revolt against Utsmani.

Utsmani, refer to Turkey Kingdom before mustafa kemal Pasha revolt and turn it into republic.
Chaos means like they push their interpretation is the right one, so other interpretation is wrong. basically Islam teachings are passed by 4 great imam or Mazhab such as Hanafi, Maliki, Syafi'i, and Hambali . But slack/Wahabi claim they don't follow them but directly follow Prophet Muhammad.
